translations.permissions: "NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.";

"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Vos données seront utilisées pour vous proposer des publicités personnalisées.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Ihre Daten werden benutzt, um Ihnen personalisierte Werbung zuzuschicken.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Tus datos se usarán para mostrarte anuncios personalizados.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Seus dados serão usados para fornecer anúncios personalizados para você.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "I tuoi dati verranno utilizzati per inviarti annunci personalizzati.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Din data kommer att användas för att skicka personligt anpassade annonser till dig.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Twoje dane zostaną wykorzystane do dostarczenia Ci spersonalizowanych reklam.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Ваши данные будут использованы для показа Вам персонализированной рекламы.";
"NSUserTrackingUsageDescription" = "Data Anda akan digunakan untuk menayangkan iklan yang dipersonalisasi untuk Anda.";
